name: Counter Chroma
description:
Game Overview

Counter Chroma is a game where complementary colours give opposing properties to surfaces. Currently, there is red paint, which is bouncy, and green paint, which is sticky.

I made this game as part of my final major project for the first year of the games design course that I'm doing. As a result of this, I don't intend to finish this game (unless it somehow becomes popular or if I randomly decide that I want to work on it). This doesn't necessarily mean that there won't be updates in the future, it's just unlikely.

Controls

(These are also available in-game)

WASD - Move 

E - Interact 

Space - Jump

Escape - Open/Close menu 

Left mouse button - Shoot paint

R - Toggle shapes (This can also be done from the menu)

Final notes

I hope you enjoy playing the game that I've made.

If you want an extra challenge, the fastest time that the level has been beaten in (that  I know of) is 26 seconds. This should still be possible (maybe even easier) in this version of the game.

The font used in the game is Arkitech Stencil.
